effectiveness.from sentence: This work demonstrates the effectiveness of incorporating sentiment labels in a wordlevel information for sentiment - related tasks compared to other word embeddings .

propose.from sentence: 1 ) We propose Emo2Vec 1 which are word - level representations that encode emotional semantics into fixed - sized , real - valued vectors .

propose to learn.from sentence: 2 ) We propose to learn Emo2Vec with a multi-task learning framework by including six different emotion - related tasks .
